title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 537.2 - Additional rules applicable to cadets
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 537.2 - Additional rules applicable to cadets

State Regulations

In addition to the said regiment of cadets the prohibited
conduct set out in the rules of the Board of Trustees, Part 535, section
535.3
of this Title, shall apply to
all students who are enrolled as cadets at such institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
537.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
